# Crystal Shard (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]])

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Long (400 feet + 40 feet/level)

**Effect:** Crystal shard

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 56

You create a thin crystal shard that comes out of the tip of your finger and flies in the direction you point, like an arrow. Make a ranged attack roll. If it succeeds, the shard inflicts 1d8+2 points of damage. After it strikes its target, the shard powders to dust.
